name: 1.08 Beta 1
body:
Toooooons of under the hood changes
Material redesign

name: 1.07.2 Final
body:
Fix some backend bugs
Fix missing

Remove the Google Play warning popup :)

name: 1.07 RC4
body:
More bugfixes !

MPDroid is also much faster now :)

This release is a release candidate. If everything goes well, it will hit the Play Store stable channel.

Improvements:
- Lots of bugfixes
- Material design for L devices (Work in progress)

name: 1.07 Beta 8
body:
Bugfixes :
- Doesn't crash on start anymore
- Fix various backend bugs
- Fix Actionbar visibility on rotation
- Added (anonymous) crash reporting

name: 1.07 Beta 7
body:
Lots and lots and lots of internal changes :
- Notification and Streaming services are now totally separated from MPDroid
- Cover art fixes
- Huge connection improvements (more robust, uses fewer connections)
- Lots of other changes, so much that we can't even remember them ;)
  Sliding Panel fixes (We're not forking the lib anymore)

Huge thanks to @avuton who did a lot of work to make this release happen !

Known bugs : 
Notification and streaming will not deal well with connection changes right now. As a work around, if you need to change connection, swipe to kill MPDroid with not playing.

name: 1.07 Beta 5
body:
Sliding panel tweaks
Bugfix for tablets ("Go to ..." was broken)
Streaming service's notification is no longer separated from MPDroid's notification
Huge notification and streaming improvements
Various bugfixes

name: 1.07 Beta 4
body:
Sliding panel tweaks
Media control drawables remade
Brought back "Use Album Artist" option
Various fixes

name: 1.07 Beta 3
body:
Settings rearrangement
Settings button moved to navigation drawer
New library/now playing navigation (Essentially looks like Google Play Music)
Tweaked light theme.

Preview : http://f.cl.ly/items/0Y2l3y3y3s3D2n191027/mpdroid_sliding.mp4

name: 1.07 Beta 2
body:
Switch to gradle build
Notification feature (unstable)
Tasker integration (REALLY UNSTABLE, might need you to Force Close MPDroid if the program gets stuck)
Cache (thanks to @hurzl)
Connection code improvement
Spanish translation
Many other changes

name: 1.07 Beta 1
body: Quick fixes before more important changes
